name: What's the Anime? Music
description:
Try our new App "Randime - Random Anime & Manga"

***** What's the Anime we are looking for? *****
 Each level contains one song which is from a certain anime - what is it?

  Find out why everyone (especially otakus) love this game and join the fun now!   

***** PURE, SIMPLE AND INSTANT FUN *****
 No registration, no complicated rules. Just start playing and enjoy fun!   

***** CAN YOU GUESS ALL OF THE LEVEL? *****
 Can you guess all the songs and unlock all levels? Countless levels from easy to difficult to tricky are waiting for you!  

***** SIMPLE AND HIGHLY ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY ***** 
What is the songs we are looking for? Listen to the songs and find out which anime they are from. Good luck and enjoy!

*****  Hazelrink's Synchro READY! ***** 

***** PROBLEM REPORT ***** 
Experiencing problem, contact us at problem@hazelrink.com

***** FEEDBACK *****
 Have any feedback or suggestion, talk to us at feedback@hazelrink.com
